Name: Star League
Details:
From 2570 to 2780, the Star League was an interstellar council formed from the Terran Hegemony, the five Great Houses of the Inner Sphere, and the Territorial States of the Periphery. The stability and prosperity of the Star League led to the flourishing of civilization and technology.

The Star League ended in civil war when the leader of the Rim Worlds Republic, Stefan Amaris murdered the First Lord in a bid to usurp his position.
